title: Soul of Night
summaries: Soul of Night is a Hardmode crafting material dropped by most enemies killed in the Underground Corruption or Underground Crimson (in the Cavern layer), with a 20*1/5 (20%) / 36*9/25 (36%) chance. This also includes enemies not native to the biome such as Granite Elementals. For details about enemies dropping souls, see Notes.

Crafting all items, excluding the boss-summoning items and Key of Night, requires 134 / 97 / 89Souls of Night. One of each boss-summoning item and a Key of Night require an additional 24 / 14 Souls of Night.
